notes: Routine follow-up for diabetes management. Patient reports good medication compliance and stable blood sugars.
diagnosisText: Patient seen in office today for routine follow-up for diabetes management. 45-year-old male with type 2 diabetes and obesity presents for routine follow-up. Patient reports good medication compliance and stable blood sugars. Diabetes well-controlled on metformin. BMI 32.5 (obese). Blood pressure slightly elevated at 138/85. No medication changes needed. Continue current diabetes regimen. Recommend weight loss program. Follow up in 3 months.
